author: potuz
content: more than the casting or not issue, for me the problem was a design question on whether internally using the go-kzg typing or not. If we're committed to that library is fine, but if we are not certain and are planning to switch between a couple of kzg libraries then it's better if the types are interchangeable and a runtime cast is possible with minimal penalty. That's why I was asking the geth team cause they are supporting both.
